turns.content: how many words can you make with octpuso without repeating letters

You can make six words using the letters in "octopus" without repeating any letters:

* "opus"
* "scoop"
* "scout"
* "pout"
* "spout"
* "out"
How many words can you make with pustooc without repeating any letters and ensuring p is in every word?

You can make four words using the letters in "pustooc" without repeating any letters and ensuring that the letter "p" is in every word:

* "pout"
* "pus"
* "puts"
* "tops"
Make a seven letter word with pustooc
"poutous" is a seven letter word that can be formed with the letters of "pustooc" without repeating any letters.
